page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW OF BLOCK
page.content: {Dairy farming}is the main industry and is centred on a number of large{farms. The main centre of{population}is concentrated in{St.Martins}in the S.W.corner and the village of{ {Dudleston}in the N.W.corner.People live in council houses or privately owned houses.Most people work outside the area.{Stan's shop}is popular for local people and supplies a large variety of goods.{Oswestry}is the main shopping centre for the area and there is a regular daily bus service.People {worship}at St.Martins Church, Dudleston Church and the Methodist Church, Ellesmere Road. The centre of{social life}in St.Martins is the{Miners' Institute.} The{coal-mine}closed in November,1968 and the mine buildings are now used for other industries and the land adjoining it has been landscaped.
